sentences.en: a member of the landed gentry
Better be the head of the yeomanry than the tail of the gentry.
sentences.cn: 宁做自由民之首,不居贵族之末.

sentences.en: Everybody was for putting down the local tyrants and evil gentry.
sentences.cn: 大家都赞成剥夺土豪劣绅的权力.

sentences.en: Gentry sent to market will not buy one bushel of corn.
sentences.cn: 门第再高贵,一斗谷子也难兑.

sentences.en: In the 18 th century, the clergy , like the nobility and gentry, often rode to hounds.
sentences.cn: 18世纪, 那些达官显贵们常去猎狐.

sentences.en: Landed income was the true measure of the gentry.
sentences.cn: 来自土地的收入是衡量是否士绅阶层的真正标准.

sentences.en: Most of the country estates were built by the landed gentry during the late 19th century.
sentences.cn: 乡间的大部分房子都是那些有土地的乡绅在19世纪后期修建的。

sentences.en: She was beaten by the Polish and Lithuanian gentry.
sentences.cn: 它败于波兰和立陶宛士绅.

sentences.en: The gentry on the grandstand laughed too, though in a much more refined way, of course.
sentences.cn: 二门内看台上的观众也笑了, 自然他们笑得很文雅, 跟轿夫们笑得不同.

sentences.en: The grammar schools were assuredly not intended for the gentry alone.
sentences.cn: 这所语法学校明确表示不会只招贵族学生.

sentences.en: The light - fingered gentry frequented these shops.
sentences.cn: 梁上君子经常光顾这些店.

sentences.en: The Methods: They employed were heavily biased in the gentry's favour.
sentences.cn: 他们采用的方法严重偏袒中上阶级.

sentences.en: The so - called golden - collar gentry are essentially nothing but brain - workers with high income.
sentences.cn: 所谓的“金领贵族”实质上不过是高收入的脑力劳动者而已.

sentences.en: They have discredited the local tyrants and evil gentry.
sentences.cn: 他们损伤了土豪劣绅的体面.

sentences.en: Ths creation of a new rural gentry , however , had another side.
sentences.cn: 事情还不只是出现了新乡绅.

sentences.en: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.--David Tyson Gentry
sentences.cn: 真正的友情是，即使两人不说话，也觉得很舒服。

words.tran_cn: 人们（多用贬义）；贵族们；（英）上流社会人士

trans.tran_cn: 绅士们，贵族们，上层阶级
trans.tran_en: people who belong to a high social class
